schedule: **2023-2024 Schedule** Dec 15-18: First Contest Jan 26-29: Second Contest Feb 16-19: Third Contest Mar 15-18: US Open For each contest, USA students wishing to receive a certified score in the platinum contest must start Saturday at 12:00 ET, when platinum problems will be first released (see contest details for more detailed instructions) May 23-June 1: Training Camp Jul 21-27: EGOI (The Netherlands) Sep 1-8: IOI (Egypt)
